name: Encephalon Gemmule

traits.name: Encephalon Progeny
entries: The gemmule matures into an encephalon cluster if not killed within 30 ({@dice 4d12 + 4}) days of its creation.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The gemmule has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Psychic Slam
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d10 damage) psychic damage.

senses: blindsight 30 ft. (can't see beyond this radius)
